info.name: Ahmad Adlouni
about: ðŸ‘‹ Greetings! I am a seasoned Software Engineer at Siren Analytics, and I moonlight as a Full Stack Web Developer for freelance projects.

My expertise spans both frontend and backend frameworks, enabling me to deliver high-quality solutions throughout the software development lifecycle. My secret weapon? A passion for innovation and a collaborative spirit. ðŸš€

Specializing in UI/UX, I shine as an Angular engineer, creating stunning user interfaces and seamless experiences. I pride myself on writing top-notch code that brings captivating designs to life. ðŸ’»

My diverse portfolio includes web development, backend systems, and chatbots. I am well-versed in Java, Spring Boot, Angular, Twilio Conversation API with DialogFlow CX, NodeJS, and GWT. Committed to continuous learning, I stay at the forefront of industry trends and technologies. ðŸ“š
Welcome to my portfolio, where code meets creativity! âœ¨

experience.description: I'm currently involved in the MODEE-EMRC project that mainly lies in front-end development. This project aims to digitize various aspects of government services in Jordan.

experience.position: Software Engineer, Senior UI & Frontend Engineer
experience.description:
- Responsible for the complete software development life cycle for the VestaPay product, from analysis to testing.

- Coordinate team efforts to ensure project plan adherence and translate user requirements into actionable tasks.

- Manage implementation and maintenance of the VSC dashboard and integrating Live Chat functionality in GWT.

- Used Figma to design visually appealing interfaces for the MPR project as a Senior UI and Front-End Engineer and led the transition from GWT to Angular and Spring Boot, integrating cutting-edge technologies like Angular 15, RxJs, NGRX, and Spring Boot.

- Implemented NodeJs/Express web server with JWT authentication, API implementation, HTTPS security, TypeScript integration, logging, and Webpack configuration.

- Developed, deployed, and maintained Dialogflow CX chatbots, designing and implementing intents, entities, and dialogue flows for seamless user experience.

- Integrated external APIs and webhooks to enhance chatbot capabilities and demonstrated capacity to innovate within business logic, exceeding business expectations through collaborative efforts.

experience.position: Frontend Web Development and Database Instructor
experience.description:
- Instruct Palestinian university students and recent graduates in Front-End Web Development and MySQL database management.

- The curriculum includes:

  • HTML essentials.
  • CSS basics and layout techniques.
  • Introductory JavaScript, covering basics, objects, and DOM manipulation.
  • Angular basics, routing, HttpClient, and services.
  • Foundational principles of MySQL Database.

- Built various web application projects and mobile applications contributing to the creation and deployment of functional Android mobile applications accessible on the Google Play Store.

- Specialize in building diverse full-stack web applications using Angular, PHP Slim, MySQL, and Microsoft SQL Server.

- Proficient in Front-End development with Angular, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, incorporating libraries like jQuery and Bootstrap for a seamless user experience.

- Efficient database design and management, adapting solutions to project-specific requirements and developing RESTful APIs for data exchange and integration.

- Integrated third-party APIs such as OnlineSim.io

- Used Git and Bitbucket as version control tools for efficient collaboration and maintaining code integrity across projects.

As a frontend developer, I was in charge of creating visually appealing and interactive user interfaces, as well as designing reusable components for the Bluering Retail platform product. This involves leveraging HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 4, and Angular 5 to enhance the user experience and functionality of the platform.

description: The project aims to spread knowledge among all the employees at all levels of the institution's sectors and departments, in order to raise the learning curve, spread the supportive institutional culture in a practical and systematic way, maximize the use of the knowledge and expertise in the organization which is a major element in promoting proactive knowledge.
The application is available in English and Arabic languages.
techDescription: This web application was developed in Entity Framework Core Web API and Angular.

description: A website that displays the wholesale prices of various mobile phones in Lebanon.
techDescription: This website was written in PHP using Slim Framework and added the PWA - Progressive Web Apps - capability to it.

description: Sim-Phones is a Web Application that allows people to buy virtual numbers from various countries (Russia, Germany, etc...) to use it in different services, such as: WhatsApp, Facebook, Viber, etc...
techDescription: This application consists of a Main website, PWA app and a Dashboard
All Web Services are written in PHP using Slim Framework, the PWA App and Dashboard are developed using Angular.

description: An android application which acts as a server for the MMService application.
This application server handles the operations for sending dollars and days to touch and alfa mobile numbers from the MMService application.
techDescription: This application was written in Java language.

description: A website that displays deals from different online stores such as AliExpress.
techDescription: The Web App consists of a Main page and a Dashboard.
The frontend of the Main page and the Dashboard were developed in Angular and consume Web APIs which are written in PHP using Slim Framework.

description: Status Saver application lets you save photo images and videos from WhatsApp application and it also allows you to share the media directly from the application to your friends.
techDescription: This application was written in Java language and uses third party libraries such as Picasso.

description: An android application that lets you search for a domain name to check its availability and its price.
techDescription: This application was written in Java language and uses GoDaddy Domains APIs.

description: An android application that lets you count your prayers on phone.
techDescription: This application was written in Java language.
